original_title: 出張先が記録的豪雨で童貞部下と突然相部屋に…雨で濡れた身体に興奮した部下に襲われ朝まで9発のびしょ濡れ絶倫性交
overview: During a business trip, a virgin subordinate and a confident female boss get stuck in a hotel room because of heavy rains.  She is way out of his league and even makes fun of him on the phone. This triggers the guy badly and gathers enough courage to jump over her. Minami finds it cute and decides to play along.
title: Sharing A Room Suddenly With A Cherry Boy Low Ranking Employee During Record-breaking Rain On A Business Trip… Minami Aizawa
